title: Who is more Toxic ?
body:
So, i went ahead and qued up for a normal game, i wanted to get good at skarner, i get into game annie mid, illaoi top, me jg skarner, bard sup, and Kalista ADC,

Kalista 8/7/3
Annie 1/12/2
Skarner 3/6/3

so i'm gonna let yous judge wether im toxic or kalista is toxic read it please, i really dis like the fact that when someone is new to a champ, another give them shit about it, and yes i know its annie point and click easy gg, she had fought zed, who was before 10 minutes was like 5/0, anyway i'm let yous read the chat and decide for yourselfs, i know this quite long too , so you don't have to read it all, just go to the bot where i make a few notes, 



( Kalista ) : nice lesson in one hone annie
( Kalitsa ) : can lose an entire game
( Kalista ) : lol
( Annie ) : complain more. i'm sure it'll make me play better
( Kalista ) : i don't want you to play better
( Kalista ) : u misunderstand
( Kalista ) : i want you to never ever play again
( Kalista ) : because you ruin the fun of others
( Skarner ) : kalista you are being unfair
( Annie ) : not my fault you got matchmade with a bronzie
( Skarner ) : you are just down right being a %%%%
( Kalista ) : no?
( Skarner ) : yes you are
( Annie ) : have a super day mate. bring a little sunshine to everyone you meet
( Annie ) : if you have no idea about basic league strategy why do it?
( Skarner ) : you 2 annie
( Kalista ) : i don't try heart surgery cus i have no idea how its done
( Annie ) : honour for you skarner. thanks for sticking up for me
( Skarner ) : thats not my point
( Kalista ) : don't suck up to bads dude it only encourages them to do worse
( Skarner ) : na na na
( Skarner ) : its dickheads like you that are so fucking salty
( Skarner ) : that ruin everyone's game
( Skarner ) : why bring people down
( Skarner ) : when it's their first time on a new champ
( Skarner ) : fucking show them don't be like gg report annie because she is shit
( Skarner ) : even though she did say at the start of the match first time annie, you still didn't give a shit
( Kalista ) : lol
( Kalista ) : first time annie
( Kalista ) : means nothing
( Kalista ) : u can play a first time hero
( Skarner ) : ummmm
( Kalista ) : and still know
( Kalista ) : to rush hourglass vs zed
( Kalista ) : and not over extend in lane
( Kalista ) : and to tower hug if ur getting wrecked
( Kalista ) : and to ward vs a lee sin
( Kalista ) : u dont need to have 1000 games on annie to work that out
( Kalista ) : also annie is a point and click a q button
( Kalista ) : but even if it was the most complex hero in the game
( Kalista ) : u dont need to understand the hero
( Kalista ) : to not go 1 - 12
( Kalista ) : that's just redic
( Kalista ) : adc is the squishiest most vulnerable role in current meta and i was vsing a 22 - 1 zed
( Kalista ) : and i still went positive
( Kalista ) : not saying he shud have won lane or raped the zed or shud be 100 cs up on him
( Kalista ) : but 1 - 12 is just redic
( Kalista ) : that shows a clear lack of understanding of even the simplest principles of gameplay
( Skarner ) : fair point, but still you are not bothered to show people how to play this game then, help them out and not give them shit
( Skarner ) : if you are in a higher elo, you get pair with people like us don't expect anything special because for all we know
( Skarner ) : we could fuck up on about a million things that you higher elo players wouldn't be able to fuck up on
( Kalista ) : lol im plat not diamond
( Kalista ) : plat is garbage
( Kalista ) : i'm terrible mechanically
( Skarner ) : i said plat
( Kalista ) : i just have a grasp on basic principles
( Kalista ) : i've met bronze players that could outplay me for days elo means nothing
( Skarner ) : thats also true, which is why i brought up the point of toxic players
( Skarner ) : because in bronze if you get paired with a toxic player 90 % of that time means you will straight up lose
( Skarner ) : even from champ select
( Kalista ) : theres a difference between being toxic and trutful lol
( Kalista ) : u rather me go
( Kalista ) : WELL DONE ANNIE
( Kalista ) : DONT BUY WARDS MATE ITS Ok
( Kalista ) : AS LONG AS YOU HAVE FUN WERE ALL HAVING FUN :D
( Kalista ) : YOU CAN DO IT MATE!
( Kalista ) : DON'T WORRY YOU DIDN'T JUST RUIN THE LAST 30 MINS FOR 9 OTHER HUMANS TRYING TO ENJOY THEMSELVES
( Kalista ) : AS LONG AS YOU AHVE FUN WERE ALL HAPPY! :D
( Kalista ) : thats ridiculous
( Kalista ) : this is a game not a social club
( Kalista ) : down the pub hes prolly a nice guy
( Skarner ) : i would rather go you because as soon as she died from the moment zed killed, it was gg
( Skarner ) : there was really nothing she could of done
( Kalista ) : u decided to troll me in game
( Kalista ) : because you are toxic
( Kalista ) : you picked the best player in the game
( Kalista ) : saw a plat border
( Skarner ) : how the fuck am i toxic ?
( Kalista ) : and went
( Kalista ) : i'm gunna troll this guy
( Skarner ) : really
( Kalista ) : thats toxic rofl
( Kalista ) : KALSITA RU FUCKING BAD
( Kalista ) : like wtf lol
( Kalista ) : why would u even do that
( Skarner ) : i never had said that
( Kalista ) : that's actual toxicity
( Kalista ) : trolling for no reason
( Kalista ) : u did too LOL
( Kalista ) : u were giving me the harshest lessons about how bad i was
( Kalista ) : for no reason other then u were mad at me and saw i had a plat border lol  

( Note - By this point i was laughing because he was trying to me out to be someone that i'm not, i didn't care if he was plat, i was more focused on the point of toxic players ) 

( Kalista ) : that's what toxicity is
( Kalista ) : me pointing out annie's mistakes
( Kalista ) : isn't toxicity

( This comment right ^ should just straight prove that he toxic )

( Skarner ) : there is a big difference between trolling and being toxic, i wasn't troll i'm not good at skarner, so i'm trying to get good at him, i never said any of that shit, all i fucking said was after you gave
( Kalista ) : yeah u did it for no other reason then to slam me
( Skarner ) : her shit, i just pointed out that you are ok, not as bad as the rest of us but still bad, because you wouldn't have helped anyone else
( Kalista ) : u called me bad not cus i was being bad
( Kalista ) : but cus u were angry
( Kalista ) : thats what toxicity is lol
( Skarner ) : bro i'm not even angry if anything i'm laughing at this
( Kalista ) : then why did u shit talk me haha
( Kalista ) : u need a mirror son ;p
( Kalista ) : i'm about to que up again if u wanna come with add me
( Kalista ) : gl

So yea, that's it, If you could take a few moments to leave your thoughts on this it would be awesome, because i would like to see what people have to say to this, but anyway Enjoys your day :)

replies.body:
I hope you reported this Kalista, she deserves a ban. Comparing ranks and discouraging new/learning players is very low in my books.

You're a bit of a hero for sticking up for Annie there, but just be a little more careful yourself. I know Kalista probably deserves it, but lines like:

_"its dickheads like you that are so fucking salty"_

May end up triggering a ban against your name, if you go to far.
Anyway, thanks for pointing this out, good to see some people still care about improving the community.

Agreed 100%. And while I think OP could have handled it better, I can't imagine him being in any danger here. It's good to see people standing up to that sort of behaviour, even if keeping quiet is more likely to de-escalate things.

Hey Seras,

What do you think is a good way to stand up for the Annie without being rude towards the Kalista?

Hmm well it's something that is best handled quickly, the Kali was obviously pretty intent on being toxic, so nothing you say is gonna stop that. Imo your best bet would be to ignore the Kali completely, mute her, tell the Annie what's really up and to mute her as well. 

You can say things like "don't worry about it" "you gotta start somewhere" or "everyone has to learn at some point" and help her out with any mistakes. Like say she doesn't know how to cs under turret, you can tell her that for melee its two turrets hits, and for casters it's one or two autos then a turret hit.

The important thing is not engaging the Kali, when this kind of behaviour comes up you aren't gonna change their mind with anything you can say, and regardless of how illogical their argument may be, saying anything at all just encourages them to keep talking. Instead it is important to support the Annie. Congratulate her on good plays and give her advice as non threateningly as possible basically.

Past that it's just a matter or muting and reporting.

By telling Annie to mute the dopy bastard. 

There really is no other way sadly. Muting is fast becoming the only way not to get messed up for me in this game and it is really sad as it feels like our reporting goes no where. 

I would love to get a notification when someone i report gets banned or in trouble..

Sadly no. But you can ask if he/she has muted already most the time they will tell you, if they don't respond at all they muted everyone.
You most certainly do get notified when someone you reported is punished.
Where and how do i find this magical info on people i have banned?

Well. This magical info comes in a little box that looks kinda like [this:](http://imgur.com/tnd3GPv)

http://imgur.com/tnd3GPv

It's just a pop up notification in the client. It doesn't happen as often as it should though lol.

You will see it more often if you limit your reports though. Report too often and the system will flag you as an over reporter, and thus not pay attention
Over-reported. Thats silly. It just shows how toxic our community is here in OCE. I have to report 1-2 people nearly every game when i play normal. Maybe 1 every two games on ranked. Its insane.

Agree, As for the OP, I think he could have gotten his message across with a few less swear words. Was good for you to stick up for the Annie though. It's very demoralizing to be attacked by another player in a game, but having someone stand up and have your back can turn a very bad experience around and make a player see that not everyone is bad.
i did, i reported her and blocked her, and yea i will agree i was a bit careless, so yea sorry for my carelessness :(

Kalista is the toxic one. 
Sure, Annie was having a bad game (everyone has them) and you weren't doing to fab either (learning new champs isn't always easy), but that doesn't really excuse Kalista pointing out everyones mistakes and telling them never to play the game again. Like Annie said earlier on- calling her trash and constantly pointing out her mistakes isn't going to make her play better. If anything, it sets of the player into a defensive mode and they play worse. 

Pointing out players mistakes and giving constructive criticism generally only works if you know the person irl, or if you have built a positive rapport throughout the game. 

The other thing is that you are kinda contributing to the toxic environment. By continuing to talk to the kalista, and argue with her, you are showing them that it is getting to you. The best thing you could have done in a situation like this is to mute them and continue to try and play to the best of your ability.
100% agree with you, and yea it got to me because i have seen this happen so often, its becoming an actual joke, in game thats what i did, but this is post game convo, so yea
That was some escalation.

> [{quoted}](name=Princess Yaia,realm=OCE,application-id=T8eq2lFQ,discussion-id=riXkjmbb,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-02-18T01:08:30.948+0000)
>
> Pointing out players mistakes and giving constructive criticism generally only works if you know the person irl, or if you have built a positive rapport throughout the game.

This is what shits me about kiddies. They can't handle constructive criticism. They just rage back at you with abuse because they don't want to admit that they are wrong, even if they continue to feed in game and not apply some of your constructive ideas to stop the bleeding.


======================================

e.g. very often the a sample game would go like this:

(Kalista)(Me): Annie a good idea is to build a seekers first and head towards zhonyas hourglass. It's a win win situation: armour and ap. Very good versus that Zed. When you go behind in lane, look to put a stop to it, you don't have to be the carry in every game, you have a team.
(Annie)(Kid): your mom
(Kalista)(Me): Just trying to help your lane stop feeding so badly. Doing the same thing over and over again and expecting a different result is the definition of insanity.
(Annie)(Kid): You think you're LCS shit%%%%.
(Kalista)(Me): Mate, you can abuse me all you like, but you're going to get logic back in return. If you can't handle logic and constructive ideas to **help the team**, you'll keep feeding.
(Annie)(Kid): Game is over anyways.

A few minutes later Annie is chasing like a noob through the jungle, chasing the Zed who was low after her combo, but because the enemy team are also noobs they send all 5 to bang save Zed and bang her.

(Kalista)(Me): Let's take top tower! Don't go chasing to that fight, she's dead anyways. You'll end up dying also!
(Trundle)(Another kid): STFU, worry about your own game

Both die and enemies get Baron right afterwards. Of course being a low elo game, the opposition overstay in our base after taking the inihibitor and get aced, so the game goes on. Our team then all scatter and go to farm in different areas of the jungle.

(Kalista)(Me): Come lets take a tower now!
(Annie)(Kid): You're a noob, thinking you're LCS
(Trundle)(Another kid): Fucking idiot Kalista, never in team fight
(Kalista)(Me): Pushing Lanes and taking towers is what wins, not chasing for 1 kill. Objectives>Kills
(Lee Sin)(Another Kid): Are you retarded Kalista? Just shut up
(Blitzcrank)(Another Kid): 300cs get good nub Kalista
(Kalista)(Me): Kiddies you can abuse me all you like, but unless you work as a team to take OBJECTIVES, you'll lose. Anyone can abuse someone, like wow man, im 10 years old, i can use a keyboard. GET A BRAIN and LEARN SOME BASIC WAR STRATEGY, its got nothing to do with what champion you play or how many kills or how much cs you have!
(Kalista)(Me): Towers win games. Not kills. You only kill people in this game TO TAKE OBJECTIVES TO WIN THE GAME. Not random chasing for no reason at all. You chase, you lose!
(Kalista)(Me): 5 guys chase Annie, GOOOOOOD, GET A TOWER WHILE THEY DO THAT!


Game finished after we get aced again because some noobs chased another kill into a no vision area. End of game chat screen comes up and everyone abuses me because they are noobs. Lose 8 games in a row because kiddies play at weekends. Nearly lose 9 games in a row, but miraculously in the 9th game after the mid lane "Annie" goes 0-20, they finally start to implement some of the ideas that I'm talking about. e.g. "Don't keep building damage when Diana is wrecking you, try an abyssal scepter!". Basic gameplay strategy. Opposition throw, we win. End of game screen our jungler says "I dunno how we won that game".


Summary: OCE kids have hardly any basic strategy whatsoever, and don't admit when they are wrong. Always find an excuse to justify their fuckups but never take responsibility for them. "I have lag" "WTF I thought my Q was up!" "1 more second he was dead" - even though they just chased halfway across the map and even if they got the kill, they were dead. In the meantime they lost 30cs and two towers doing it.

======================================


TLDR; what the Kalista in the OPs game said could be absolutely right, but they could have offered constructive ideas to **HELP** the Annie, not just abuse them. However the Annie would probably just ignore the ideas and do the same thing unless a miracle happened. OCE lol in a nutshell. Give me Korean bronze league anyday, i'm sick of noobs with no gameplay skills.

Bro, please with your last section of your comment, i think is absolutely wrong, on so many levels, yea Kalista did tell annie to get a zyonha's, but annie couldn't have done a single thing, couldn't farm, couldn't do anything, so buy the time she did get zyonhas, zed was to point where he need like 4 people to kill him, the annie didn't ignore him, but he still continued to give annie crap, for something she couldn't do because she got so far behind, so to go on, if you are sick of bronze league with no gameplay skill, then don't play ranked, and congrats on getting out of bronze, you are in sliver 5 with 0 lp and a 37% win ratio in ranked, good job ! i don't think you have the right to say you are sick of other people being bad at this game, when you have a 37% win ratio, you have good kda's no doubt there, but if you are consistently losing because of other team mates, how about you roam and help them, instead of complaining.

Ok i'll explain, you can't simply come on to forums, and complain about people being bad at the game, it just like when i play yas, im horrible at him but still no one lifts a lift to help me understand why im bad at him and how i can improve, i was bloody told to kill myself because i went 1/9/7 as yas. But back to the original comment, "No, don't carry on like a pork chop" what is this suppose to imply ???, the fact that you out right said that everyone in bronze is just horrible at this game, well mate from what i have been told sliver is just the same expect people ward and such, and we did, she did listen but it to much into late game for it to have an effect on the game as it was.

>"But there's nothing annie could do!!!!!!!!" BULLSHIT.

It was true though, as i just said it was to late into the game for it have an impact on the outcome of the game. Plus don't edit the quote, goes to prove that you are more of a lying low life.

>Don't play ranked? Because people are noobs? How about people improve instead. And btw I wasn't in bronze.

Well yea, it's clear to say that you are almost outright salty because you are solely complaining about how bad people in bronze are, but not once have you mentioned that you have tried to help others out, but to be completely honest, focus on your own game then you won't have to care about how others are playing and if you see someone getting fed, you can just easily go and kill them with your team. So if you are straight out in silver, then how come you get paired with people from bronze ? That doesn't make much sense to be honest, besides your attitude towards other players is exactly why i thought you were in bronze, no offence.

Even in the games i win, people have no idea of WAR STRATEGY. It's like the game is a lottery. You can have no towers no inhibitors, with the enemies having their base intact, and just win one teamfight and win the game. It's retarded. People would do well to read Sun Tzu's book. Yea while you do, you don't have a right to say almost anything you said in your original post because you striaght outright said that others need to improve yes ?, i find it hard to believe that no one had told you that you could improve, i know there is heaps of stuff to improve on, and can be as simple as placing wards every time you get a trinket charge, or i don't know buy a pink and put it some where on the map. It can be a lot of things that people can improve on. I also don't think it acceptable for you to say that this game is like a lottery, because if it was, winning lotto would be easy as fuck, but it's not, that is down to true chance. League is not a game of chance, it a team game where if you work together to achieve victory then you will straight up work better as a team hands down and improve your chances of winning. And what's Sun Tzu's Book? , never heard of it before. 

One last question, If you think that other people need to improve on their game and they have no knowledge of 'war tactics', then what makes you say, that your so good ?

1. Not carrying on like a pork chop = don't talk about irrelevant things. Stick to the topic.

2. I'm not editing quotes, i'm shortening the jist of the argument. Don't talk semantics, again stick to the topic. The point is even if Annie is 0-20, she can still do something for her team. The game is not over. And if Kalista was nice, she could give Annie some constructive ideas to help her situation. That's the point.

3. Assuming i'm salty? Focus on your own game? This whole paragraph is a load of babble. We are not talking about me.

4. "Yea while you do, you don't have a right to say almost anything you said in your original post because you striaght outright said that others need to improve yes ?" 

The point of this discussion is not to make a point that the person who says the last thing wins the argument and get a bunch of brownie points. I can say anything I like, it's all about how you interpret this information. Others do need to improve, a **HELL OF A LOT** in OCE. I can say that because they **ARE** very bad at simple gameplay. I just said it, you can't take it back. I don't need to be good to say that.  I don't need to be challenger to say that. I could be WOOD 5 division and still what I just said is true. I could be toxic. I could be a retard. I could be god. It does not matter. 

They could start by reading Sun Tzu's book. Or watching youtube. **OR ACCEPTING IDEAS FROM OTHER PLAYERS IN THEIR TEAM INSTEAD OF DOING THE SAME STUPID FEEDING STUFF OVER AND OVER LIKE AN IMBECILE AND NOT HELPING THEIR TEAM**. Granted, Kalista did not do this. But in some games, other players will offer advice, and they should take it, not disregard it because they have a bronze ego.

When CLG thought they were a good team in NA, their new coach (Montecristo, fyi) came in and told them they were bunch of noobs compared to Koreans. Why? Because they had little macro understanding of simple gameplay. He made them read this book of Sun Tzu's. It was written before electricity was invented, but the principles are the same.
Why are Korean's so good? Because they understand simple war strategy. 5 pebbles vs 5 pebbles on summoners rift, and all you can buy are four items, dorans blade or ring, and cloth armour, null magic mantle. Who wins the game? At the moment, Koreans win the game. How would you play the game if you were Annie and you were 0-2 against Zed early on in game? Change the items, change the champions, it doesn't make a shred of difference. What you do in terms of STRATEGY impacts the most on the game.

Annie could look up youtube "how to play when behind - 30 tips". There are many videos on this topic. Very helpful. If all players under platinum in OCE watched that video, the level of skill in the region would be far greater.

Lastly I did not say that i'm "so good"? Where do you get these assumptions from?

I'm finished talking on this subject. Players with a brain won't bother to read the babble, they will just take the points of the argument and implement them in their own gameplay. Have a good day.
